summary: **Treasure Planet** is a 2002 Disney animated sci-fi adventure movie based on the book *Treasure Island*. It's set in space but uses spaceship designs that look like old sailing ships. The film follows a young man named Jim Hawkins and his search for treasure. It was directed by John Musker and Ron Clements and has a star-studded voice cast. Despite being well-received, it didn't make much money in theaters. The film cost $140 million to make, making it the most expensive traditional animated film ever. It was also the first film to play in regular and IMAX theaters at the same time.
title: Treasure Planet
